actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of an individual the first $5,000 received from civil service and Foreign Service retirement annuities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the first $5,000 received from civil service and Foreign Service retirement annuities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of an individual the first $5,000 received from civil service and Foreign Service retirement annuities.
